programme.desc: This July 2025, four of the world’s top football clubs, Liverpool FC, AC Milan, Arsenal and Tottenham Hotspur, are set to make history at the Hong Kong Football Festival 2025 (HKFF), hosted at Kai Tak Stadium. The two European giants have a storied history, including unforgettable UEFA Champions League Finals in 2005 and 2007, with each club securing one victory. programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Murders in Pont-Aven
programme.desc: The bodies of two gallery owners are found. These murders are reminiscent of the death of Suzanne, a painter, 20 years ago. The investigation is led by Marion, Suzanne's daughter, and by Antoine who was in charge of the investigations at the time.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 5: Let It Go
programme.desc: Despite political pressure to close the case and managing to avoid fingerprint detection, Shelly is put in a precarious position when descriptions from new witnesses threaten to implicate her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 6: Silent Mouth
programme.desc: The pressure builds on all fronts as Jason tries to close the case. Will Shelly be able survive as the pressure builds? The one option closed to her is to flee - she would never leave her children.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Staring Into The Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hémon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Abandoned Skies
programme.desc: A cargo plane pilot is trapped alone with his plane in Earth orbit due to a nuclear war. Until one day he found someone else’s connection in space.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: El Alamein – The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of searing daytime heat and chilling nighttime cold, three-time Italian Academy Awards winner Enzo Monteleone paints a gritty, powerful WW II epic of the Italian army’s battle with the Germans to drive Allied Forces from North Africa.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Puan
programme.desc: When Professor Marcelo Pena finally is about to be appointed Head of the Philosophy Department, the famous and seductive Professor Sujarchuk returns from Europe to claim the kingdom for himself.

programme.title: FBI: International S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: The FBI's International Fly Team tracks and neutralizes threats against American citizens.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41 - EP 7998
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Fantasy Team - EP 6
programme.desc: Fantasy Team welcomes some of the best acts to ever grace the Got Talent stages from all over the world. Judges will draft their ultimate line-up from America's choice of acts across the global Got Talent franchise. Singer and songwriter Mel B returns as a judge, alongside Executive Producer Simon Cowell, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel, with Terry Crews to host.

programme.title: Lingo UK S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: Nico Reynolds: All Fired Up - Series 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Nico's mouthwatering dishes, his boundless enthusiasm and unrivalled knowledge of the grill are guaranteed to bring some sunshine, whatever the weather! This six-part series is all about giving you the skills, tips and recipes to help you up your grilling game and barbecue like a pro. Nico's here to introduce his signature BBQ recipes and combinations that will keep your guests coming back for more.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S8 - EP 14
programme.desc: The junior version of this global phenomenon returns, hosted by BAFTA-winning comedian Harry Hill. Pastry chef and food writer Ravneet Gill and Bake Off alumnus Liam Charles return to judge the efforts of more budding bakers. It's a mouth-watering journey, as 16 of the country's best young bakers compete. A joyful way of getting children passionate about food.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! & The Chipmunks S2 - EP 39

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hémon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: Puan
programme.desc: When Professor Marcelo Pena finally is about to be appointed Head of the Philosophy Department, the famous and seductive Professor Sujarchuk returns from Europe to claim the kingdom for himself.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: El Alamein – The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of searing daytime heat and chilling nighttime cold, three-time Italian Academy Awards winner Enzo Monteleone paints a gritty, powerful WW II epic of the Italian army’s battle with the Germans to drive Allied Forces from North Africa.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: Murders in B éarn
programme.desc: At the foot of the majestic Béarn mountains, the wife of a notable, dressed as a medieval queen, is discovered drowned under the La Légende bridge in Sauveterre-de-Béarn. The exact spot where, in the 12th century, Queen Sancie was condemned to drowning for infanticide...

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.
